name: Oil Tanker Transporter Cargo
description:
Now start heavy duty of oil tanker truck driving free. let’s start drive of an extremely powerful Oil Tanker to feel the thrill of off-road driving and wonder of the city with your own oil tanker driving cargo truck game. Get the real experience of oil cargo tanker driving and aspect the off road mountain

Features
*Different offroad tracks
*High definition 3d graphics
*Multiple background music
*Great realistic gameplay
*Multiple tilt controls
*Side map view
*Multi-angle camera views
